actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 9, 1966, to provide for a description of certain lands to be conveyed by the United States to the city of Albuquerque, N. Mex.

summary.text: Provides for a more specific description of the boundaries of a parcel of land conveyed by the United States to the city of Albuquerque, New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 9, 1966, to provide for a description of certain lands to be conveyed by the United States to the city of Albuquerque, N. Mex.
